definition: rice paper/membrane of glutinous rice, used to wrap sweets etc
rice cake dumpling/sticky rice cake/mochi cake

sentences.english: The grain shop is now in need of glutinous rice.
sentences.chinese: 那糧店現在正需要糯米。

sentences.english: Spring Festival period, each and every family must manufacture dozens of catty glutinous rice glutinous rice cakes.
sentences.chinese: 春節期間，家家戶戶都要製作數十斤的糯米餈粑。

sentences.english: Glutinous rice and then funnel flat little dumplings are deflated too much smoke there.
sentences.chinese: 糯米飯然後漏斗平，小餃子是癟的，有太多的煙。

sentences.english: Health and glutinous rice amylopectin in the "room" is a closed-exist.
sentences.chinese: 生糯米中的支鏈澱粉的“房間”是以封閉狀態存在的。

sentences.english: Heater breeze, the sun, the air thick with incense of glutinous rice.
sentences.chinese: 暖風習習，豔陽高照，空氣中瀰漫着濃濃的糯米香。

sentences.english: The jizo brought the rice cakes.
Mirin is a transparent, sweet cooking wine made from glutinous rice, frequently used in Japanese cooking.
sentences.chinese: 米林酒是糯米釀造的，常用於日本烹飪的透明甜米酒。

sentences.english: In its place is the sticky, gooey, sugar-laden, American treat.
sentences.chinese: 取而代之的是糯米，粘性，甜甜的美國美食。

sentences.english: Steam the glutinous rice in a wok or steamer.
sentences.chinese: 將糯米放在鑊或蒸籠上蒸熟。

sentences.english: Who brought the rice cakes to the old man and woman?
sentences.chinese: 誰給這對老人帶來了糯米糕？

sentences.english: Yes. I used microwave oven to make it.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我用微波爐來加熱糯米雞。

sentences.english: The dumplings are made of sticky rice flour stuffed with different fillings.
sentences.chinese: 元宵由糯米粉製成，跟餃子一樣佐以不同餡料。

sentences.english: I should, ve ordered glutinous rice chicken.
And I can make some rice wine brewing on my own.
sentences.chinese: 有時我也自己釀製一些糯米酒。

sentences.english: Then, I put a piece of green beans into add a little rice.
sentences.chinese: 然後，我把一塊綠豆沙塞了進去，再放一點糯米。

sentences.english: Tangyuan is made from glutinous rice flour.
sentences.chinese: 湯圓是由糯米粉做成的。

definition: sticky rice/short-grain rice/Oryza sativa var. japonica
nian gao, New Year cake, typically a sweet, steamed cake made with glutinous rice flour
long-grained rice (Indian rice, as opposed to round-grained rice 粳米[jing1 mi3])
boiled balls of glutinous rice flour, eaten during the Lantern Festival
